docs.title: Welcome to Sample Documentation
docs.text: This is a sample documentation site built with MkDocs Material and deployed using GitHub Pages.

docs.title: Document Structure
docs.text:
• You can add all of documents in doc folder without any frontmatter
  • Page order is set using nav: setting in configuration 
    nav:
  - Home: index.md
  - Typography: Typography.md
  - Configuration: Configuration.md

docs.title: Sample Repos
docs.text: • https://strandsagents.com/latest/documentation/docs/

docs.title: KaTeX
docs.text:
[KaTeX] is a lightweight library that focuses on speed and simplicity. It supports a subset of LaTeX syntax and can render math to HTML and SVG. To use [KaTeX] within your project, add the following lines to your mkdocs.yml.

Location : docs/javascripts/katex.js" 

document$.subscribe(({ body }) => { // (1)!
    renderMathInElement(body, {
    delimiters: [
        { left: "$$",  right: "$$",  display: true },
        { left: "$",   right: "$",   display: false },
        { left: "\\(", right: "\\)", display: false },
        { left: "\\[", right: "\\]", display: true }
    ],
    })
})

docs.title: With Title
Line Numbers
docs.text:
def bubble_sort(items):
    for i in range(len(items)):
        for j in range(len(items) - 1 - i):
            if items[j] > items[j + 1]:
                items[j], items[j + 1] = items[j + 1], items[j]

docs.title: Highlight specific lines
docs.text:
def bubble_sort(items):
    for i in range(len(items)):
        for j in range(len(items) - 1 - i):
            if items[j] > items[j + 1]:
                items[j], items[j + 1] = items[j + 1], items[j]
